name: Planet Horse
description: Planet Horse is a pixel-perfect Play-to-Earn horse racing game built on the Ronin Network, combining strategic gameplay, competitive racing, and digital ownership. Players train, evolve, and race NFT horses to earn $PHORSE and $MEDAL, the core tokens powering upgrades, item trading, and leaderboard progression.

contracts.label: Planet Horse Token
contracts.description: Planet Horse ERC20 token, PHORSE fuels Planet Horse Economy.

contracts.label: Planet Horse - Origin Horses
contracts.description: Origin Horses NFT - Origin Horses are a unique breed with higher stats and growth potential.
